description: Comprehensive data extraction schema for IRS Form 990-PF (Private Foundation) including financial, governance, and operational information

fields.name: ein
fields.description: Federal Employer Identification Number of the organization

fields.name: legal_name
fields.description: Official registered name of the organization

fields.name: phone_number
fields.description: Primary contact phone number

fields.name: website_url
fields.description: Organization's website address

fields.name: return_type
fields.description: Type of IRS return filed (990-PF for private foundations)

fields.name: amended_return
fields.description: Indicates if this is an amended return (Yes/No)

fields.name: group_exemption_number
fields.description: IRS group exemption number, if applicable

fields.name: subsection_code
fields.description: IRS subsection code (typically 501(c)(3) for foundations)

fields.name: ruling_date
fields.description: Date of IRS ruling or determination letter

fields.name: accounting_method
fields.description: Accounting method used (Cash, Accrual, or Other)

fields.name: organization_type
fields.description: Legal structure (corporation, trust, association, etc.)

fields.name: year_of_formation
fields.description: Year the organization was established

fields.name: incorporation_state
fields.description: State where the organization was incorporated

fields.name: total_revenue
fields.description: Sum of all revenue sources for the year

fields.name: contributions_gifts_grants
fields.description: Revenue from donations, contributions, and grants

fields.name: program_service_revenue
fields.description: Revenue generated from program services

fields.name: membership_dues
fields.description: Revenue from membership dues and assessments

fields.name: investment_income
fields.description: Income from interest, dividends, and other investments

fields.name: gains_losses_sales_assets
fields.description: Net gains or losses from sale of investments and assets

fields.name: rental_income
fields.description: Income from rental of real estate or equipment

fields.name: related_organizations_revenue
fields.description: Revenue received from related organizations

fields.name: gaming_revenue
fields.description: Revenue from gaming and gambling activities

fields.name: other_revenue
fields.description: All other revenue not categorized elsewhere

fields.name: government_grants
fields.description: Revenue from federal, state, and local government grants

fields.name: foreign_contributions
fields.description: Revenue from foreign sources and contributors

fields.name: total_expenses
fields.description: Sum of all organizational expenses for the year

fields.name: program_services_expenses
fields.description: Direct expenses for charitable program activities

fields.name: management_general_expenses
fields.description: Administrative and general operating expenses

fields.name: fundraising_expenses
fields.description: Expenses related to fundraising activities

fields.name: grants_us_organizations
fields.description: Grants and assistance provided to domestic organizations

fields.name: grants_us_individuals
fields.description: Grants and assistance provided to domestic individuals

fields.name: grants_foreign_organizations
fields.description: Grants and assistance provided to foreign organizations

fields.name: grants_foreign_individuals
fields.description: Grants and assistance provided to foreign individuals

fields.name: compensation_officers
fields.description: Total compensation paid to officers and key employees

fields.name: compensation_other_staff
fields.description: Compensation paid to other employees

fields.name: payroll_taxes_benefits
fields.description: Payroll taxes, pension plans, and employee benefits

fields.name: professional_fees
fields.description: Legal, accounting, and other professional service fees

fields.name: office_occupancy_costs
fields.description: Rent, utilities, and facility-related expenses

fields.name: information_technology_costs
fields.description: IT equipment, software, and technology expenses

fields.name: travel_conference_expenses
fields.description: Travel, conferences, conventions, and meetings

fields.name: depreciation_amortization
fields.description: Depreciation of equipment and amortization of intangibles

fields.name: insurance
fields.description: Insurance premiums and related costs

fields.name: officers_list
fields.description: JSON array of officers, directors, trustees, and key employees with their details

fields.name: governing_body_size
fields.description: Total number of voting members on the governing body

fields.name: independent_members
fields.description: Number of independent voting members

fields.name: financial_statements_reviewed
fields.description: Whether financial statements were reviewed or audited

fields.name: form_990_provided_to_governing_body
fields.description: Whether Form 990 was provided to governing body before filing

fields.name: conflict_of_interest_policy
fields.description: Whether organization has a conflict of interest policy

fields.name: whistleblower_policy
fields.description: Whether organization has a whistleblower policy

fields.name: document_retention_policy
fields.description: Whether organization has a document retention and destruction policy

fields.name: ceo_compensation_review_process
fields.description: Process used to determine compensation of organization's top management

fields.name: public_disclosure_practices
fields.description: How organization makes its governing documents and annual returns available to the public

fields.name: program_accomplishments_list
fields.description: JSON array of program service accomplishments with descriptions and financial details

fields.name: total_fundraising_event_revenue
fields.description: Total revenue from all fundraising events

fields.name: total_fundraising_event_expenses
fields.description: Total direct expenses for all fundraising events

fields.name: professional_fundraiser_fees
fields.description: Fees paid to professional fundraising services

fields.name: number_of_employees
fields.description: Total number of employees during the year

fields.name: number_of_volunteers
fields.description: Estimate of volunteers who provided services

fields.name: occupancy_costs
fields.description: Total costs for office space and facilities

fields.name: fundraising_method_descriptions
fields.description: Description of methods used for fundraising

fields.name: joint_ventures_disregarded_entities
fields.description: Information about joint ventures and disregarded entities

fields.name: base_compensation
fields.description: Base salary or wages paid to key personnel

fields.name: bonus
fields.description: Bonus and incentive compensation paid

fields.name: incentive
fields.description: Other incentive compensation

fields.name: other_compensation
fields.description: Other forms of compensation

fields.name: non_fixed_compensation
fields.description: Whether compensation arrangement is non-fixed

fields.name: first_class_travel
fields.description: Whether first-class or charter travel was provided

fields.name: housing_allowance
fields.description: Whether housing allowance or residence was provided

fields.name: expense_account_usage
fields.description: Whether payments for business use of personal residence were made

fields.name: supplemental_retirement
fields.description: Whether supplemental nonqualified retirement plan was provided

fields.name: lobbying_expenditures_direct
fields.description: Amount spent on direct lobbying activities

fields.name: lobbying_expenditures_grassroots
fields.description: Amount spent on grassroots lobbying activities

fields.name: election_501h_status
fields.description: Whether the organization made a Section 501(h) election

fields.name: political_campaign_expenditures
fields.description: Amount spent on political campaign activities

fields.name: related_organizations_affiliates
fields.description: Information about related organizations involved in political activities

fields.name: investment_types
fields.description: Description of types of investments held

fields.name: donor_restricted_endowment_values
fields.description: Value of permanently restricted endowment funds

fields.name: net_appreciation_depreciation
fields.description: Net appreciation or depreciation in fair value of investments

fields.name: related_organization_transactions
fields.description: Information about transactions with related organizations

fields.name: loans_to_from_related_parties
fields.description: Information about loans to or from related parties

fields.name: penalties_excise_taxes_reported
fields.description: Whether the organization reported any penalties or excise taxes

fields.name: unrelated_business_income_disclosure
fields.description: Whether the organization had unrelated business income

fields.name: foreign_bank_account_reporting
fields.description: Whether the organization had foreign bank accounts or assets

fields.name: schedule_o_narrative_explanations
fields.description: Additional narrative explanations from Schedule O
